explanations.reason: The paper focuses on a systematic literature review of Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) methods for Research and Development (R&D) Project Portfolio Selection (PPS). It does not discuss any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it mention any of the provided keywords related to machine learning or deep learning. The study is centered on decision-making approaches and criteria in the context of R&D projects, not on data-driven or learning-based methods.
